CustomField.description: New Lead Score based only on employee number implemented in 08.2021. RO-530
CustomField.formula: IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 10000,"AAA", IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 5000, "AA", IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 2500, "A", IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 1000, "B", IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 500, "C", IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 250, "D", IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 50, "E", IF( NumberOfEmployees >= 10, "F", "G" ))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: New Lead Score based only on employee number implemented in 08.2021.
CustomField.label: Lead Score v02
